2.caption_en:
Illustrative diagram mapping AWS services to a platform architecture framework, showing core value layers (Infrastructure, Intelligence, Engagement, Ecosystem), their subcomponents, the five architectural pillars, and representative AWS services for each area.

{
  "title": "Illustrative: Overview / Mapping of the AWS Services to the Platform Architecture Framework",
  "purpose": "Map AWS services to platform architecture value layers and show alignment with the five architecture pillars.",
  "core_and_sub_value_layers": [
    {
      "name": "Infrastructure",
      "subcomponents": [
        "Server, Network, Compute"
      ],
      "representative_services": [
        "Amazon EC2",
        "Amazon EBS",
        "Amazon Route 53",
        "AWS Storage Gateway",
        "AWS Direct Connect"
      ],
      "notes": [
        "Provides server, network, compute services required to run the platform",
        "Offers proactive monitoring of platform infrastructure and applications"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Intelligence",
      "subcomponents": [
        "Data Management, Machine Learning",
        "Catalog & Inventory"
      ],
      "representative_services": {
        "Data Management, Machine Learning": [
          "Amazon S3",
          "Amazon Redshift",
          "AWS Lambda",
          "TensorFlow on AWS",
          "MXNet on AWS",
          "AWS Deep Learning AMI"
        ],
        "Catalog & Inventory": [
          "AWS Glue",
          "Amazon QuickSight",
          "Amazon Athena",
          "Amazon SageMaker",
          "AWS Deep Learning AMI"
        ]
      },
      "notes": [
        "Provides ability to create machine learning models and harness AI/ML",
        "Enables product catalog creation, search, inventory tracking, order processing"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Engagement",
      "subcomponents": [
        "Personalization",
        "Marketing & Communication"
      ],
      "representative_services": {
        "Personalization": [
          "AWS IoT Greengrass",
          "AWS Lambda",
          "AWS AppSync",
          "AWS IoT Events"
        ],
        "Marketing & Communication": [
          "Amazon Connect",
          "Amazon SQS",
          "Amazon SNS",
          "Amazon SES"
        ]
      },
      "notes": [
        "Personalizes experience based on persona interest to improve sustained customer engagement",
        "Tracks conversion events to optimize cost and revenue; maximizes ROAS/ROMI"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Ecosystem",
      "subcomponents": [
        "Connectivity"
      ],
      "representative_services": [
        "AWS IoT Events",
        "AWS IoT",
        "AWS IoT Greengrass",
        "AWS Lambda",
        "AWS AppSync",
        "AWS API Gateway",
        "Amazon EventBridge"
      ],
      "notes": [
        "Drives platform connectivity with users through UI, Mobile, Edge (IoT) devices",
        "Provides connectivity with platform stakeholders through APIs and event bus interfaces, event processing and messaging"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "the_five_pillars": [
    "Operational Excellence",
    "Security",
    "Reliability",
    "Performance",
    "Cost Optimization"
  ]
}
